sqlMap.select: SELECT 'DPL' AS NODE_TYPE , DPL_ID AS NODE_ID , PRJ_ID AS UPPER_NODE_ID , DPL_NM AS NODE_NM , DPL_VER AS NODE_SUB_NM FROM DPL1000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DPL_DEL_CD = '02' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'JEN' AS NODE_TYPE , Z.JEN_ID AS NODE_ID , Z.DPL_ID AS UPPER_NODE_ID , Y.JEN_NM AS NODE_NM , NULL AS NODE_SUB_NM FROM DPL1300 Z INNER JOIN DPL1000 X ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = X.DPL_ID AND X.DPL_DEL_CD = '02') INNER JOIN JEN1000 Y ON ( Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Y.USE_CD = '01' AND Y.DEL_CD = '02') WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.USE_CD = '01' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'JOB' AS NODE_TYPE , Z.JOB_ID AS NODE_ID , Z.JEN_ID AS UPPER_NODE_ID , X.JOB_ID AS NODE_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(X.LIC_GRP_ID, 'DPL00002', X.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS NODE_SUB_NM FROM DPL1300 Z INNER JOIN DPL1000 W ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = W.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = W.DPL_ID AND W.DPL_DEL_CD = '02') INNER JOIN JEN1000 Y ON ( Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Y.USE_CD = '01' AND Y.DEL_CD = '02') INNER JOIN JEN1100 X ON ( Y.LIC_GRP_ID = X.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = X.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = X.JOB_ID AND X.USE_CD = '01' ) WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.USE_CD = '01'

SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT A.BLD_RESULT, COUNT(*) AS BLD_RESULT_CNT, SUM(A.BLD_DURATION_TM) AS BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM FROM DPL1400 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_RESULT_CD NOT IN('01','02') AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.REG_DTM >= TO_DATETIME(#searchStDtm# || ' 00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
AND A.REG_DTM <= TO_DATETIME(#searchEdDtm# || ' 23:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
GROUP BY A.BLD_RESULT ) SUBT1
ORDER BY
SUBT1.BLD_RESULT
SUBT1.BLD_RESULT_CNT
SUBT1.BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM
DESC

SELECT SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.* , TRUNC((SUBT1.BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT/BLD_RESULT_CNT)*100) AS BLD_SUCC_PERCENT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPL1700 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = SUBT1.PRJ_ID AND DPL_ID = SUBT1.DPL_ID ) AS REVISION_PATHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.DPL_ID , B.DPL_NM , COUNT(*) AS BLD_RESULT_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.BLD_RESULT,'SUCCESS',1)) AS BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT , SUM(A.BLD_DURATION_TM) AS BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM FROM DPL1400 A INNER JOIN DPL1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND B.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_RESULT_CD NOT IN('01','02') AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.REG_DTM >= TO_DATETIME(#searchStDtm# || ' 00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
AND A.REG_DTM <= TO_DATETIME(#searchEdDtm# || ' 23:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID, A.DPL_ID, B.DPL_NM ) SUBT1 ) SUBT2
ORDER BY
SUBT2.DPL_NM
SUBT2.BLD_RESULT_CNT
SUBT2.BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT
SUBT2.BLD_SUCC_PERCENT
SUBT2.BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM
SUBT2.REVISION_PATHS_CNT
DESC

SELECT SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.JEN_ID , SUBT1.JEN_NM , SUBT1.JOB_ID , SUBT1.BLD_RESULT_CNT , SUBT1.BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT , SUBT1.BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM , TRUNC((SUBT1.BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT/BLD_RESULT_CNT)*100) AS BLD_SUCC_PERCENT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPL1700 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = SUBT1.PRJ_ID AND JEN_ID = SUBT1.JEN_ID AND JOB_ID = SUBT1.JOB_ID ) AS REVISION_PATHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.JEN_ID , B.JEN_NM , A.JOB_ID , COUNT(*) AS BLD_RESULT_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.BLD_RESULT,'SUCCESS',1)) AS BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT , SUM(A.BLD_DURATION_TM) AS BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM
FROM DPL1400 A INNER JOIN JEN1000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.DEL_CD = '02') WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_RESULT_CD NOT IN('01','02') AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.REG_DTM >= TO_DATETIME(#searchStDtm# || ' 00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
AND A.REG_DTM <= TO_DATETIME(#searchEdDtm# || ' 23:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID, A.JEN_ID, B.JEN_NM, A.JOB_ID ) SUBT1 ) SUBT2
ORDER BY
SUBT2.JEN_NM
SUBT2.JOB_ID
SUBT2.BLD_RESULT_CNT
SUBT2.BLD_SUCC_RESULT_CNT
SUBT2.BLD_SUCC_PERCENT
SUBT2.BLD_DURATION_TM_SUM
SUBT2.REVISION_PATHS_CNT
DESC

SELECT SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.DPL_ID , SUBT1.JEN_ID , SUBT1.JOB_ID , SUBT1.BLD_SEQ , SUBT1.BLD_NUM , SUBT1.BLD_RESULT , SUBT1.BLD_RESULT_MSG , SUBT1.BLD_DURATION_TM , TO_CHAR(COALESCE(SUBT1.BLD_START_DTM, SUBT1.REG_DTM), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BLD_START_DTM , SUBT1.JEN_NM , SUBT1.DPL_NM , TO_CHAR(SUBT1.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DTM , SUBT1.REG_USR_ID , COALESCE(SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(SUBT1.REG_USR_ID, '1'),'없음') AS BLD_USR_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPL1700 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = SUBT1.PRJ_ID AND DPL_ID = SUBT1.DPL_ID AND JEN_ID = SUBT1.JEN_ID AND JOB_ID = SUBT1.JOB_ID AND BLD_SEQ = SUBT1.BLD_SEQ ) AS REVISION_PATHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.JEN_NM, C.DPL_NM FROM DPL1400 A INNER JOIN JEN1000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.DEL_CD = '02') INNER JOIN DPL1000 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.DPL_ID = C.DPL_ID AND C.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_RESULT_CD NOT IN ('01','02') AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.REG_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStDtm# || ' 00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
AND A.REG_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEdDtm# || ' 23:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC ) SUBT1 ) SUBT2 WHERE 1=1 AND SUBT2.RN <=
#rptRecentBldDataSortCnt#
20
ORDER BY
SUBT2.JEN_NM
SUBT2.JOB_ID
SUBT2.DPL_NM
SUBT2.BLD_START_DTM
SUBT2.BLD_USR_NM
SUBT2.BLD_DURATION_TM
SUBT2.REVISION_PATHS_CNT
DESC
